implementations: ServiceKind::Display - returns capitalized names (Service, VirtualObject, Workflow)
ServiceKind::FromStr - case-insensitive parsing, supports kebab-case and PascalCase
compatible_service_kinds() - Entry nodes: all 3; State nodes: VirtualObject+Workflow; Promise nodes: Workflow only
required_context_types() - Entry nodes: all 5; State nodes: ObjectExclusive+WorkflowExclusive; Promise nodes: WorkflowExclusive

verification.command: cargo test --lib -- graph::restate_types && cargo test --lib -- graph::workflow_node
